dk.bigherman.aero
Class GeoCalc

java.lang.Object
  dk.bigherman.aero.GeoCalc

public class GeoCalc
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the mathematical engine for calculating geographical information e.g distances, lines of bearing, etc.

rhumbDistance

public double rhumbDistance(com.bbn.openmap.LatLonPoint from,
                            com.bbn.openmap.LatLonPoint to,
                            double rhumbBearing)
Rhumb Distance is the distance between two points along a line of constant bearing

Parameters:
from - point from which distance along Rhumbline should be calculated, must be converted to radians before use
to - point to which distance along Rhumbline should be calculated, must be converted to radians before use
rhumbBearing - bearing of Rhumbline between two points, along which distance should be calculated, must be provided in dgrees
Returns:

rhumbBearing

public double rhumbBearing(com.bbn.openmap.LatLonPoint from,
                           com.bbn.openmap.LatLonPoint to)
Rhumb Bearing is a line of constant bearing between two points on the Earth

Parameters:
from - point from which bearing along Rhumbline should be calculated
to - point to which bearing along Rhumbline should be calculated
Returns:
bearing of Rhumbline between two points
